pages.text: Eligible creatures in the vicinity of the ritual will magically shed, dropping items as though they had been slain by a player, without suffering any actual harm.$(br2)This ritual is a way of stocking up in precious items as well as maintaining a $(l:concepts/pacifism)pacifist$() life-style.$(br2)$(info) Looting $(ritual:animal_harvest/ROMAN/looting_value) will be randomly applied to some drops.
$(standing_stones) As a $(l:rituals/tiers)$(bold)tier III$() ritual, $(l:rituals/ritual_animal_harvest#multiblock)3 standing stones are required to begin$(). Please see later pages of this entry.
The ritual requires three $(l:rituals/standing_stones)standing stones$() of runestone or runed obsidian.

pages.title: Ritual Specifics
pages.text: $(bold)Duration:$() The ritual lasts for $(ritual:animal_harvest/SECONDS/duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Size:$() Ritual area extends $(ritual:animal_harvest/radius_x) and $(ritual:animal_harvest/radius_z) blocks from the center, and vertically by $(ritual:animal_harvest/radius_y) blocks.$(br2)$(bold)Creatures:$() $(ritual:animal_harvest/count) eligible creatures are selected at random every $(ritual:animal_harvest/SECONDS/interval) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Looting:$() Looting $(ritual:animal_harvest/ROMAN/looting_value) has a $(ritual:animal_harvest/PERCENT/looting_chance) chance of being applied per eligible creature.

$(bold)Glowing$(): Eligible creatures who drop items while the ritual is active will have the glowing effect applied to them for $(ritual:animal_harvest/SECONDS/glowing) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Fish:$() If water blocks are found, $(ritual:animal_harvest/fish_count) fish have $(ritual:animal_harvest/PERCENT/fish_chance) chance of being spawned, with a potential for $(ritual:animal_harvest/fish_additional) additional fish.
